p: To confirm in vivo the reduced antigenicity observed for the L6 sequences using bioinformatics, eight-week-old male C57BL/6 mice were immunized with L1 and L6 isolates, and spleen cells were collected to analyze B and T cell activation by flow cytometry. B cell activation was measured by analyzing CD21 +/CD40 + expression, and L6 did not appear to activate B cells ( Fig 6B). An analysis of CD4 and CD8 expression demonstrated that L1 induced a much higher frequency of activated CD4 +/CD69 + ( Fig 6C) and CD8 +/CD25 + cells ( Fig 6D) than L6, indicating prominent T cell activation.
